title: Battery Drain and Constant Reboot Pixel 2
content:
Battery drain extremely high after October 2020 security patch which became worse after implementing Android 11. I can watch the battery percentage drop like a countdown timer. Phone is not hot. 

Followed the conventional steps, including factory reset as new, safe mode, etc.  No improvement. 

Phone also constantly reboots at around 50% and is therefore unusable. 

Did two chat sessions with support. Google's answer is to send it in for repair. BTW the phone is 3 months out of warranty. Unbelievable, I expected more transparency from Google. This issue is blowing up the internet. 

My wife's pixel 2 has the exact same issue.   Neither of us have tunein installed.
